subsheet.name: Create / Attach / Detatch instance / Show / Hide

stage.name: Text
stage.initialvalue: we shape our buildings and afterwards they shape us

input.name: Directory Path
input.narrative: The path in which to create the directory

input.name: Error If Already Exists
input.narrative: True to generate an error if the directory already exists

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The name of the file to check

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The full path to the file to delete

exception.detail: "Test setup failed. Unable to delete file: " & [File Name]

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The name of the file to check

exception.detail: "Create Doc / Save As test failed. File not on disk after 'Save As' action"

input.name: documentname
input.narrative: The name of the document for which the body text is required

input.name: handle
input.narrative: The handle to the Word instance in which the document is open

input.name: start
input.narrative: The start of the text range within the body for which the text is required

input.name: finish
input.narrative: The finish of the text range within the body for which the text is required

output.name: Body
output.narrative: The text of the main body of the word document

stage.name: Create / Attach / Detatch instance / Show / Hide

input.name: handle
input.narrative: The handle to the instance to be detached from

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The full path and filename of the document that the instance should attach to, empty indicates that the topmost Word instance be attached to

output.name: handle
output.narrative: The handle to the newly created instance, attached to either an existing Word window or a new one.

input.name: handle
input.narrative: The handle for the instance which should become the current instance

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The name of the file to check

exception.detail: "Export PDF test failed. Unable to find exported file on disk: " & [Test Directory] & "test.pdf"

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The name of the file to check

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The full path to the file to delete

input.name: Table Number
input.narrative: The number of the table within the word document

input.name: append
input.narrative: Optional, default False will overwrite.

input.name: Table Number
input.narrative: The number of the table within the document

input.name: Cell x Number
input.narrative: The x location number of the cell within the table (starts at 1)

input.name: Cell y Number
input.narrative: The y location number of the cell within the table (starts at 1)

exception.detail: "Set table Cell value or Get Table Cell value action failed"

input.name: steps
input.narrative: Optional, positive number to move forward, negative to move back, default 1.

input.name: section
input.narrative: Default 1

input.name: footer
input.narrative: Default 1

input.name: Table Number
input.narrative: The number of the table within the document

input.name: Cell x Number
input.narrative: The x location number of the cell within the table (starts at 1)

input.name: Cell y Number
input.narrative: The y location number of the cell within the table (starts at 1)

stage.name: Create / Attach / Detatch instance / Show / Hide

input.name: Table Number
input.narrative: The number of the table within the document

input.name: Cell x Number
input.narrative: The x location number of the cell within the table (starts at 1)

input.name: Cell y Number
input.narrative: The y location number of the cell within the table (starts at 1)

exception.detail: "'Select next cell' or 'set selected cell value' action failed"

field.name: highlight index
field.description: A value from from the wdColor enumeration

input.name: documentname
input.narrative: The name of the document for which the body text is required

input.name: handle
input.narrative: The handle to the Word instance in which the document is open

input.name: start
input.narrative: The start of the text range within the body for which the text is required

input.name: finish
input.narrative: The finish of the text range within the body for which the text is required

output.name: Body
output.narrative: The text of the main body of the word document
